next.name: In the Land of the Mallas

segments.pli: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā kosalesu viharati sālāya brāhmaṇagāme.
segments.en: At one time the Buddha was staying in the land of the Kosalans near the brahmin village of Sālā.
There the Buddha addressed the mendicants:

segments.pli: “seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ye keci tiracchānagatā pāṇā, sīho migarājā tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati, yadidaṃ—thāmena javena sūrena;
segments.en: “Mendicants, the lion, king of beasts, is said to be the best of animals in terms of strength, speed, and courage.

segments.pli: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci bodhipakkhiyā dhammā, paññindriyaṃ tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati, yadidaṃ—bodhāya.
segments.en: In the same way, the faculty of wisdom is said to be the best of the qualities that lead to awakening in terms of becoming awakened.
And what are the qualities that lead to awakening?

segments.pli: Saddhindriyaṃ, bhikkhave, bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, taṃ bodhāya saṃvattati;
vīriyindriyaṃ bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, taṃ bodhāya saṃvattati;
satindriyaṃ bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, taṃ bodhāya saṃvattati;
samādhindriyaṃ bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, taṃ bodhāya saṃvattati;
paññindriyaṃ bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, taṃ bodhāya saṃvattati.
segments.en: and wisdom are qualities that lead to awakening, in that they lead to becoming awakened.

segments.pli: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ye keci tiracchānagatā pāṇā, sīho migarājā tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati, yadidaṃ—thāmena javena sūrena;
segments.en: The lion, king of beasts, is said to be the best of animals in terms of strength, speed, and courage.

segments.pli: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci bodhipakkhiyā dhammā, paññindriyaṃ tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati, yadidaṃ—bodhāyā”ti.
segments.en: In the same way, the faculty of wisdom is said to be the best of the qualities that lead to awakening in terms of becoming awakened.”

suttaplex.blurb: Just as the lion is the king of beasts, wisdom is the chief of qualities that lead to awakening.
